definitions.definition: A plant, Reseda odorata, having greyish-green flowers with orange-coloured stamens, and exhaling a delicious fragrance. In Africa it is a low shrub, but further north it is usually an annual herb.
A mignonette tree (Lawsonia inermis), source of the dye henna.
A greyish-green colour, like that of the flowers of the plant.
Of a greyish-green colour, like that of the flowers of the plant.
